H0.text: What is the forename of Lewis Hamilton’s father, a prominent member of his entourage. David

H1.text: What is the forename of Lewis Hamilton’s father, a prominent member of his entourage. Julian

H2.text: What is the forename of Lewis Hamilton’s father, a prominent member of his entourage. Nigel

H3.text: What is the forename of Lewis Hamilton’s father, a prominent member of his entourage. Anthony

A5.text: His father, Anthony Hamilton, is of Afro-Grenadian descent.
